verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> he looked up, <S%G308><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> rich men <S%G4145><s%> casting <S%G906><s%> their <S%G848><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> treasury. <S%G1049><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> poor <S%G3998><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> casting in <S%G906><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> mites. <S%G3016><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> Of a truth <S%G230><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> poor <S%G4434><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> hath cast in <S%G906><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than they all: <S%G3956><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G537><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> have of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> abundance <S%G4052><s%> cast in <S%G906><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> offerings <S%G1435><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> she <S%G3778><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G848><s%> penury <S%G5303><s%> hath cast in <S%G906><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> living <S%G979><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> she had. <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> as some <S%G5100><s%> spake <S%G3004><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple, <S%G2411><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> it was adorned <S%G2885><s%> with goodly <S%G2570><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gifts, <S%G334><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%>

As for these things <S%G5023><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye behold, <S%G2334><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> will come, <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> there shall not <S%G3756><s%> be left <S%G863><s%> one stone upon another, <S%G3037><s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3037><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> be thrown down. <S%G2647><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> but when <S%G4219><s%> shall <S%G3767><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> be? <S%G2071><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> will there be when <S%G3752><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> shall <S%G3195><s%> come to pass? <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Take heed <S%G991><s%> that ye be not <S%G3361><s%> deceived: <S%G4105><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> Christ; and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> draweth near: <S%G1448><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> ye not <S%G3361><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye shall hear <S%G191><s%> of wars <S%G4171><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> commotions, <S%G181><s%> be not <S%G3361><s%> terrified: <S%G4422><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> come to pass; <S%G1096><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> by and by. <S%G2112><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he unto them, <S%G846><s%> Nation <S%G1484><s%> shall rise <S%G1453><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> kingdom: <S%G932><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> earthquakes <S%G4578><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> in divers places, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> famines, <S%G3042><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pestilences; <S%G3061><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> fearful sights <S%G5400><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> shall there be <S%G2071><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> all <S%G537><s%> these, <S%G5130><s%> they shall lay <S%G1911><s%> their <S%G848><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> you, delivering you up <S%G3860><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> into prisons, <S%G5438><s%> being brought <S%G71><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rulers <S%G2232><s%> for my name's sake. <S%G1752><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3686><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> it shall turn <S%G576><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony. <S%G3142><s%>
Settle <S%G5087><s%> it therefore <S%G3767><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to meditate before <S%G4304><s%> what ye shall answer: <S%G626><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a mouth <S%G4750><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your <S%G5213><s%> adversaries <S%G480><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> be able <S%G1410><s%> to gainsay <S%G471><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> resist. <S%G436><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> ye shall be betrayed <S%G3860><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> parents, <S%G1118><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kinsfolk, <S%G4773><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> friends; <S%G5384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> shall they cause to be put to death. <S%G2289><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> ye shall be <S%G2071><s%> hated <S%G3404><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men for my name's sake. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3686><s%>
But <S%G2532><s%> there shall not <S%G3364><s%> a hair <S%G2359><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> perish. <S%G622><s%>
In <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> possess <S%G2932><s%> ye your <S%G5216><s%> souls. <S%G5590><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye shall see <S%G1492><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> compassed <S%G2944><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> armies, <S%G4760><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> desolation <S%G2050><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> is nigh. <S%G1448><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> let them <S%G3588><s%> which are in <S%G1722><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mountains; <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let them <S%G3588><s%> which are in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of it <S%G848><s%> depart out; <S%G1633><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let not <S%G3361><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> countries <S%G5561><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> thereinto. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%>
For <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> be <S%G1526><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of vengeance, <S%G1557><s%> that all things <S%G3956><s%> which are written <S%G1125><s%> may be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> unto them that are with child, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to them that give suck, <S%G2337><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days! <S%G2250><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> distress <S%G318><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> land, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> upon <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall fall <S%G4098><s%> by the edge <S%G4750><s%> of the sword, <S%G3162><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall be led away captive <S%G163><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations: <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> trodden down <S%G3961><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the times <S%G2540><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sun, <S%G2246><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in the moon, <S%G4582><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in the stars; <S%G798><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> distress <S%G4928><s%> of nations, <S%G1484><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> perplexity; <S%G640><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the waves <S%G4535><s%> roaring; <S%G2278><s%>

Men's <S%G444><s%> hearts failing them <S%G674><s%> for <S%G575><s%> fear, <S%G5401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for looking after <S%G4329><s%> those things which are coming on <S%G1904><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth: <S%G3625><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> powers <S%G1411><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> shall be shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall they see <S%G3700><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a cloud <S%G3507><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when these things <S%G5130><s%> begin <S%G756><s%> to come to pass, <S%G1096><s%> then look up, <S%G352><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lift up <S%G1869><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> heads; <S%G2776><s%> for <S%G1360><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> redemption <S%G629><s%> draweth nigh. <S%G1448><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> a parable; <S%G3850><s%> Behold <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fig tree, <S%G4808><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> trees; <S%G1186><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> they now <S%G2235><s%> shoot forth, <S%G4261><s%> ye see <S%G991><s%> and know <S%G1097><s%> of <S%G575><s%> your own selves <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> summer <S%G2330><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> nigh at hand. <S%G1451><s%>

So <S%G2532><s%> likewise <S%G3779><s%> ye, <S%G5210><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> ye see <S%G1492><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> come to pass, <S%G1096><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> ye that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> nigh at hand. <S%G1451><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> pass away, <S%G3928><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G302><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> be fulfilled. <S%G1096><s%>
Heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall pass away: <S%G3928><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> shall not <S%G3364><s%> pass away. <S%G3928><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> take heed <S%G4337><s%> to yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> lest at any time <S%G3379><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> be overcharged <S%G925><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> surfeiting, <S%G2897><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cares <S%G3308><s%> of this life, <S%G982><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> so that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> come <S%G2186><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> unawares. <S%G160><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a snare <S%G3803><s%> shall it come <S%G1904><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that dwell <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3956><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

Watch <S%G69><s%> ye therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and pray <S%G1189><s%> always, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2540><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may be accounted worthy <S%G2661><s%> to escape <S%G1628><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> that shall <S%G3195><s%> come to pass, <S%G1096><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> daytime <S%G2250><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple; <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> at night <S%G3571><s%> he went out, <S%G1831><s%> and abode <S%G835><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mount <S%G3735><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> the mount of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> came early in the morning <S%G3719><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple, <S%G2411><s%> for to hear <S%G191><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
